summary: Big grass overhaul. Almost 120 different types of grasses, plants and shrubs. New landscapes giving variations to Skyrim terrain. No more the same grasses for pineforest or whiterun. New farmland terrain. 4k, 2k and 1k textures.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59774-1-1415473582.jpg[/img]

[center][youtube]vXP5JR5QGxY[/youtube][youtube]DBPH9Onlh_I[/youtube][/center]
[center][youtube]7W4AG_iP8Qc[/youtube][youtube]clOB1zw6g8c[/youtube][/center]

First this isn't a different mod than TR - Flora. I splitted it in TR grasses and TR trees so I can work better with both since they will be huge mods. What I want is give lot of variety in Tamriel flora. Not always the same grasses for Forest zones, Whiterun tundra, The Rift or The Reach. So what I did was add more landcapes and tweak cell blocks adding more spots with different combinations. Check screens below for some of them. Also some landscapes have a combination of many grasses and plants, but with different densities putting details on the plants to not look like a mess.

This is a big grass overhaul. Changes vs first TR - Flora are:

- There are almost 120 different types of plants and grasses.
- Rework on some of the old textures. New ferns, riverwood grass, daisies and more.
- Rare spots with different grass combinations to add variety.
- Riverside reeds.
- New textures for shrubs and bushes like mimosa, pines and whatever the others are called.
- New farmland texture to avoid grasses on it.

[size=3][b][color=red]UPDATES[/color][/b][/size]
-1-14-05 Added v.1.1. Some clipping fixed, tweaked texture colors and new tall grasses with better look.

-11-15-04 Added field grass edition, more tall grasses for who like fields of grass. Some new grasses for whiterun replacing old ones. Little fps hit in some places.
The Rift got more yellow grass also some new ones. Check screens in middle of screen section. Is some kind of test version to check colors and fps hit. Overwritte all when installing if you have any TR grass mod.

-11-14-04 Uploaded a missing texture, whiterun fern.

[size=3][b][color=orange]INSTALLATION[/color][/b][/size]

If you already have the old TR Flora.esp overwrite it.

[size=3][b][color=red]Important to get all plants working:[/color][/b][/size]
Before install edit Skyrim.ini in /my docs/my games/skyrim and add iMaxGrassTypesPerTexure=15 in [Grass] section like this:

[Grass]
iMaxGrassTypesPerTexure=15

[size=4][b][color=red]1[/color][/b][/size]- Download the files you want and install via NMM or copying content into Skyrim/data folder and click "yes" when prompted.
[size=4][b][color=red]2[/color][/b][/size]- Activate the .esp file in NMM.
[size=4][b][color=red]3[/color][/b][/size]- If you want to use any optional file, chose the file and install via NMM or copying content into Skyrim/data folder and click "yes" when prompted.

[size=2][b][color=orange]Compatibility[/color][/b][/size]
Seems that people got working the first version with SFO 2, Uniquegrasses and other grass mods. All depends of which mod is installed the latest and which one is loaded the latest.

[size=2][b][color=orange]Load order[/color][/b][/size]
If u want TRF, install it the latest and also load it after any texture mod. That means if you are using TR textures and parallas, TRF must be loaded and installed after (below) to overwrite grasses.

Example:
-SFO.esp
-Tamriel reloaded textures and parallax.esp (to keep the roads)
-Tamriel reloaded flora.esp
-Tamriel reloaded trees.esp

[size=2][b][color=orange]Landscape Textures[/color][/b][/size]
I included as optional files the TR textures & parallax landscape textures to make grasses melt with terrain. Other mod textures will work good too.

[size=2][b][color=orange]ENBs[/color][/b][/size]
I tested some and seems all are ok except that some of them make grass too dark. That can be fixed by playing with DirectLightingIntensityDay= and DirectLightingCurveDay=
For the pics i used last version of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49834/?]Tamriel Reloaded ENB[/url].

[size=2][b][color=orange]FPS[/color][/b][/size]
If you fps is low try the performance esp. Still low? then edit skyrim.ini and add iMinGrassSize=20 in [Grass] section and increase it by +5 each time until you get the desired fps:

[Grass]
iMaxGrassTypesPerTexure=15
iMinGrassSize=20

[size=2][b][color=orange]Recomended mods:[/color][/b][/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802/?]Climates of Tamriel 3.1[/url] (i like more than pureweather)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39799/?]Climates Of Tamriel - Weather Patch[/url] (use volumetric fog only if you have good gaming pc)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46925/?]Tamriel Reloaded - Textures and Parallax[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13268/?]WATER[/url] (Never used Pure waters but must work).
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?]Static Mesh Improvement Mod[/url]
